name: AstroLunch
tagline: Summarizes the topics we have discussed in the Astronomy Seminar (AKA AstroLunch@Uniandes)
body:
## Welcome
In this webpage we will keep track of the topics discussed (or to be discussed) during AstroLunch @Uniandes. We will meet up in Room M-100 every Friday at 1PM. During the first 15 minutes we will discuss the latest in the journals (Nature or Science) or any other interesting paper on the arXiv. In the next 40 minutes we will try to have 2 talks. One by somebody external to Uniandes and the second one by local students or faculty. One of the talks must discuss a recent paper found on the arXiv

Ah! And this is Astro **Lunch**. Remember to bring your own lunch and some food to share.

##Programme (2014-I)

### Week 1 (January 24)

* Jaime E. Forero-Romero. Turismo Astronómico + ArXiv + Beer Power 

### Week 2 (January 31)

* Jaime E. Forero-Romero. [A Global Cloud Map of the Nearest Known Brown Dwarf](http://arxiv.org/abs/1401.8145)

### Week 3 (February 7)

* Jaime E. Forero-Romero. [A cosmic web filament revealed in Lyman-alpha emission around a luminous high-redshift quasar](http://arxiv.org/abs/1401.4469)
* Juan Pablo Arango. [Estrellas variables AM Canum Venaticorum.](https://github.com/forero/AstroSeminarUniandes/blob/master/pdf/201410/20140207_Arango_CVn_binaria.pdf)

### Week 4 (February 14)

* Paola Castaño. [Reporte de una socióloga en un viaje de campo.](https://github.com/forero/AstroSeminarUniandes/blob/master/pdf/201410/20140214_Castano_VilladeLeyva.pdf)


### Week 5 (February 21)

* Christian Poveda. [Casinos y Sistemas Extrasolares](https://github.com/forero/AstroSeminarUniandes/blob/master/pdf/201410/20140221_Poveda_C_Casinos.pdf)
* Juan Rafael Álvarez. [Desigualdad de Bell Cósmica](https://github.com/forero/AstroSeminarUniandes/blob/master/pdf/201410/20140221_Alvarez_JR_Bell.pdf)

### Week 6 (February 28)

* Jorge Nicolás Hayek.

### Week 7 (March 7)

* Sergio Silva.
* Jose Gregorio Fernández.

### Week 8 (March 14)

* Paulina Hoyos.
* Juan Sebastián Castellanos (OAN)

### Week 9 (March 21)

* María Camila Remolina

### Week 10 (March 28)

* **Deadline First Report**
* Diego Umaña
* Carolina Ramírez Cely

### Week 11 (April 4)

* Felipe Gómez

### Week 12 (April 11)

* Brigitte Pinto

### Week 13 (April 25)

* David Alemán
* Sebastián Velasco

### Week 14 (May 2)

* Juan Carlos Basto Pineda

### Week 15 (May 9)

* **Deadline Last Report**



##Grading

If you are getting credits from this seminar, you have to be graded. We will grade attendance (20%), class participation -give at least one talk- (20%) and a project (30% first report + 30% final report). The project can be anything from studying an interesting paper to dealing with a research project that might end up being the subject for your undergrad thesis.

##Contact
Jaime E. Forero-Romero (http://wwwprof.uniandes.edu.co/~je.forero/ email: je.forero) will lead the seminar during 2014-I. Contact him if you want to give a talk or know more about AstroLunch.
